column1:
0534|five-thirty-four|I asked "What time is sunrise?‚Äù
A second's silence while the crestfallen Bush absorbed his rebuke
0534|four minutes later|At five-thirty. I was here about four minutes later. Judging by the appearance of the blood and the beginning of rigor in the side of the face
column2: I guessed that he had been dead about five hours.
